doc.title: Three js

value.content: three.js is a JavaScript-based WebGL engine that can run GPU-powered games and other graphics-powered apps straight from the browser. The three.js library provides many features and APIs for drawing 3D scenes in your browser.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Three.js on Wikipedia
  • three.js official website
